sqlQuery.name: GroupAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT g.name AS group_name, g.number_of_members, round(100 * number_of_match_pairs / (number_of_members * (number_of_members - 1)), 0) as percent_match_pairs, g.number_of_match_pairs, g.avg_percent_identity, g.avg_percent_match, g.avg_connectivity, g.avg_evalue_mant, g.avg_evalue_exp FROM apidb.OrthologGroup g

sqlQuery.name: MSA
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT g.name AS group_name, g.multiple_sequence_alignment AS msa FROM apidb.OrthologGroup g

sqlQuery.name: MaxSequenceLength
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name, MAX(eas.length) AS max_length FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id GROUP BY og.name

sqlQuery.name: SVG
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT g.name AS group_name, g.svg_content FROM apidb.OrthologGroup g

sqlQuery.name: EcNumbers
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name, ecListMap.ec_list as ec_numbers FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, (SELECT ec_map.ortholog_group_id, listagg(ec.ec_number || ' (' || ec_count || ')', ', ') within GROUP ( ORDER BY ec.ec_number) AS ec_list FROM sres.EnzymeClass ec, (SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id, asec.enzyme_class_id, COUNT(*) AS ec_count FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec WHERE asec.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id, asec.enzyme_class_id ) ec_map WHERE ec_map.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id GROUP BY ec_map.ortholog_group_id ) ecListMap WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ecListMap.ortholog_group_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: TaxonCounts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name as group_name, ot.orthomcl_taxon_id AS taxon_id, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbrev, count(*) as count FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, APIDB.ORTHOLOGGROUPAASEQUENCE ogs, DOTS.externalaasequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id GROUP BY og.name, ot.orthomcl_taxon_id, ot.three_letter_abbrev

sqlQuery.name: Proteins
sqlQuery.sql: select sa.group_name, sa.full_id, sa.taxon_name, sa.length, sa.product as description, sa.old_groups as previous_groups, sa.ec_numbers from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa

sqlQuery.name: PFams
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT og.name AS group_name, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id ORDER BY db.primary_identifier

sqlQuery.name: ProteinPFams
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT og.name AS group_name, eas.secondary_identifier AS source_id, eas.length, da.primary_identifier, da.start_min, da.end_max FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas LEFT JOIN (SELECT df.aa_sequence_id, db.primary_identifier, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id ) da ON eas.aa_sequence_id = da.aa_sequence_id WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id ORDER BY eas.secondary_identifier ASC, da.start_min ASC

sqlQuery.name: EcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: select og.name as group_name, ec_map.ec_number, ec_map.description, count(*) as sequence_count from apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthologGroup og, (select distinct eas.aa_sequence_id, ec.ec_number, ec.description from dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec where eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id and asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id) ec_map where ec_map.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id and ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id group by og.name, ec_map.ec_number, ec_map.description order by og.name, sequence_count desc
